Rulings.Base:
1. This is an Ignition Effect that you activate during your Main Phase.
2. Sending "Force Resonator" to the GY is a cost.
3. This effect targets 1 face-up monster you control.
4. When a monster targeted by "Force Resonator" attacks, your opponent cannot use "Call of the Haunted".
5. When a monster targeted by "Force Resonator" attacks, your opponent can use "Raigeki Break" as long as they don't target a monster.
6. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects that target a monster(s) until the end of the Damage Step, even if the attacking monster leaves the field before then.
